channel.title: Org on Sobremesa en Milliways
channel.description: Recent content in Org on Sobremesa en Milliways

item.title: First post from ox-hugo
item.author: pablo.palazon@gmail.com (Pablo Palazon)
item.description: This is my first export from ox-hugo I’m using One post per Org subtree for posts with org-mode. Figure 1: One post per Org subtree snapshot Reference Please visit ox-hugo github page or ox-hugo website. There is a ox-hugo test website where you can learn how to configure your documents

channel.item: My org mode configuration https://ppalazon.github.io/2018/04/11/my-org-mode-configuration/ Wed, 11 Apr 2018 00:00:00 +0200 pablo.palazon@gmail.com (Pablo Palazon) https://ppalazon.github.io/2018/04/11/my-org-mode-configuration/ Table of Contents Personal org-mode configuration This is my personal list with most used commands on org-mode. It’s contains snippets, shortcuts and configurations. <<<<<<< HEAD Personal org-mode configuration (require 'package) (add-to-list 'package-archives '("org" . "https://orgmode.org/elpa/") t) (require 'org) ;; Enabled ox-hugo (with-eval-after-load 'ox (require 'ox-hugo)) ;; Configuration of org-mode (setq org-startup-indented t) (setq org-startup-folded "overview") (setq org-agenda-inhibit-startup t) (setq org-directory "~/org") (setq org-capture-directory (concat org-directory "/capture")) (setq org-publish-directory (concat org-directory "/publish")) (setq org-ref-directory (concat org-directory "/ref")) (setq org-default-notes-file (concat org-capture-directory "/notes. ======= Personal org-mode configuration (global-set-key (kbd "<f12>") 'org-agenda) (global-set-key (kbd "<f5>") 'bh/org-todo) (global-set-key (kbd "<S-f5>") 'bh/widen) (global-set-key (kbd "<f7>") 'bh/set-truncate-lines) ;; <f8> is for neotree-toggle ;;(global-set-key (kbd "<f8>") 'org-cycle-agenda-files) (global-set-key (kbd "<f9> <f9>") 'bh/show-org-agenda) (global-set-key (kbd "<f9> b") 'bbdb) (global-set-key (kbd "<f9> c") 'calendar) (global-set-key (kbd "<f9> f") 'boxquote-insert-file) (global-set-key (kbd "<f9> g") 'gnus) (global-set-key (kbd "<f9> h") 'bh/hide-other) (global-set-key (kbd "<f9> n") 'bh/toggle-next-task-display) (global-set-key (kbd "<f9> I") 'bh/punch-in) (global-set-key (kbd "<f9> O") 'bh/punch-out) (global-set-key (kbd "<f9> o") 'bh/make-org-scratch) (global-set-key (kbd "<f9> r") 'boxquote-region) (global-set-key (kbd "<f9> s") 'bh/switch-to-scratch) (global-set-key (kbd "<f9> t") 'bh/insert-inactive-timestamp) (global-set-key (kbd "<f9> T") 'bh/toggle-insert-inactive-timestamp) (global-set-key (kbd "<f9> v") 'visible-mode) (global-set-key (kbd "<f9> l") 'org-toggle-link-display) (global-set-key (kbd "<f9> SPC") 'bh/clock-in-last-task) (global-set-key (kbd "C-<f9>") 'previous-buffer) (global-set-key (kbd "M-<f9>") 'org-toggle-inline-images) (global-set-key (kbd "C-x n r") 'narrow-to-region) (global-set-key (kbd "C-<f10>") 'next-buffer) (global-set-key (kbd "<f11>") 'org-clock-goto) (global-set-key (kbd "C-<f11>") 'org-clock-in) (global-set-key (kbd "C-s-<f12>") 'bh/save-then-publish) (global-set-key (kbd "C-c c") 'org-capture) (global-set-key (kbd "C-c 0") (lambda () (interactive) (find-file "~/org/capture/refile. >>>>>>> tmp
